name: Pizza Paradise
description: Authentic Italian pizza with fresh ingredients, including vegetarian options.

name: Burger Barn
description: Classic beef and chicken burgers, with loaded fries.

name: Vegan Vibes
description: Delicious and creative plant-based dishes, from salads to hearty mains.

name: Taco Town
description: Serving up tasty tacos and burritos with a variety of fillings.

name: The Hydration Station
description: Stay hydrated! Official water and soft drink point.

name: Crafty Corner
description: A selection of local and international craft beers.

name: Wok & Roll
description: Quick and delicious noodle stir-fries made to order.

name: Coffee Stop
description: Get your caffeine fix with quality espresso, coffee, and tea.

name: The Cocktail Bar
description: Classic and signature cocktails mixed by expert bartenders.

name: Gozleme Tent
description: Traditional Turkish savory flatbreads with various fillings.
